website_summaries.verdict: Another great choice from Hunter. This one comes with an LED light kit.
pros: Energy efficient dimmable lighting package on this Hunter is a great choice
It does not wobble and provides a quality product for the price
cons: Remote function can be tricky to figure out

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful fan! The remote does not communicate properly with ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful fan! The remote does not communicate properly with fan. I cannot turn the light on without the fan or the other way as well. They sent me a new remote and sensor but it was installed on a high ceiling by an electrician so I will need to pay him to come back and do it again. It's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Works really well and makes a world of difference in the summertime. It always works, but the light bulb that comes with it is very dim. You could always change it, though. It’s a nice looking fan. The remote control doesn’t always work on the first try. There have been a few times where I had to press the buttons repeatedly, but it does work most of the time. Overall, I’m satisfied with this fan. As far as installation, the directions were very clear and well illustrated. Installation was time consuming, but it wasn’t hard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding fan for this price. Looks great, very sturdy and quality construction. Assembled just as any other fan except for the blades, which were just a tad more difficult to fasten, but still nothing to lose sleep over. Very good instructions compared to other brands we have purchased in the past. Very quiet motor. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: tbroy

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, Lackluster remote
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well. Very quiet even on high setting. My only complaint is regarding the remote. I use the remorte to turn off the light after I'm already in bed. I must turn the light back on with the remote. If I try to use the main wall switch, it will not turn on. Additionally, the buttons are flush with the face of the remote, so finding the correct button in the dark was a challenge until I used a drop of glow in the dark paint on the light button. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JenEddie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option compared to new...
customer_reviews.text: Just like a new fan. Brown box, but it's packaged like a new product. Included a remote, which didn't work. Seller followed up with an email, and after hearing it was non-functional, immediate mailed a replacement. Can't ask for more than this. Excellent product, and service with a 'smile'.
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, light goes in and out with a loud noise like it's going to blow. Totally waste of money. Just install it but have it for sometime now. Will add video soon.
customer_reviews.author: Doyd Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: 3 work perfect one wobbles on high no matter what we do ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast service and item as described. I'm giving a 4 star instead of 5 because I purchased 4 fans, 3 work perfect one wobbles on high no matter what we do to correct it. Also had remote problem. Company sent new remote quickly. I don't want to pay the electrician to take down the fan and put up a new one so Ill probably keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Received this package on time. He was extremely easily put together and it's worked perfectly thus far. For a refurbished product it's beautiful there are no nicks, dents or dings. I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Smokeyoo

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish, efficient fan for a fraction of the cost of others
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish! The fan is very quiet and efficient. It cooled a warm and stuffy room in a very short amount of time. The price is 1/2 the cost of others.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Black

customer_reviews.title: Fans were great
customer_reviews.text: No issue with the fans. worked great. Only issue was the delivery. Both fans were delivered in the rain. Left out side in cardboard boxes. It was several hours before we got home. They were delivered a day early which is great, but planned on being home the next day when they were scheduled. Luckily, the cardboard was washed away, cleaned and dried the fans, they worked. Is there not cheap plastic bags for days like this?
customer_reviews.author: Scott mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I’m a year in. Super quiet. Remote is great. A little bit of a booger to install but well worth it for the price. Was skeptical about refurb fans but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: happy with fans new construction installs
customer_reviews.text: great looking fan at a super great price, electricians installed 4 in new construction with wall switch control (not using remotes). happy with results. light is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Chazz del

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan works well thank you
customer_reviews.text: The Ceiling fan is very very nice. Works really well and the light works well also thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: the instructions make it easier to install, however, I never managed to activate the option to dim the light. that's why I do not give it 5 stars. It is very quiet and looks beautiful in my room.
customer_reviews.author: DARBETT JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, comes out very nice in my bedroom- ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, comes out very nice in my bedroom- also very quiet, I don't hear it at all. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shmuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan I ordered on for my living then ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan I ordered on for my living then ordered a second for another room. I'm a licensed electrician and installed plenty of fans over the years this one very simple to install. Shipping was great packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely stupid when you get a refurbished piece that wasnt fixed at all. Trying to fix this just to install was a waste of money. If it goes together and dkesnt work you will hear more
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: The fan worked great on first attempt to turn on and love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this fan on time and installation took about 2-3 hours (but mostly because we had to drill screws directly into the ceiling). The fan worked great on first attempt to turn on and love the remote feature and how quiet the fan is. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Diefenbach

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation plus some drawbacks...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 3-1/2 stars. 1-1/2 star less in 5 because: 1) It has the seasonal change over switch in side light housing - that's not convenient 2) I expect the reverse switch in the remote! Other than that the installation was easy for a reasonably handy person.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thakkar

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Is ok. Worked fine for the first month and now is making noise. Should have bought a new one vs a factory refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Parces

customer_reviews.title: quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan great buy. I have seen these for a lot more money
customer_reviews.author: Betty Swofford

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. I did have an issue with the remote, but if you follow others posts on how to correct, it works out just fine. Quick and easy return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for refurbished fan!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a refurbished fan and it works great. Took a bit to install, but it works great and well worth the savings!
customer_reviews.author: MrsD2010

customer_reviews.title: Light flickers
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great now! If it does not come on the first time (it flickers) open the remote, press and hold the reset/pair button and the light button.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Dawson

customer_reviews.title: The fan works and the unit looks good. However
customer_reviews.text: The fan works and the unit looks good. However, after one week one of the fan's blades started to delaminate requiring me to glue it to prevent it from further delaminating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stolting

customer_reviews.title: Good fan / light combo
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does what it says. Good fan / light combo.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S Blome

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great look in our family room. Creates moving air as expected. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Shop and Ship

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan- it is quiet and looks nice in the room
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and super quiet with lots of wind!!!
customer_reviews.text: They look great and super easy to install!!! Took about 30 min per fan to install
customer_reviews.author: johnhall7467

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and good looking , with lots of light from the LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: DPBoston

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my living room, thanks
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks great and works well and the remote is awesome to have!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Just installed my fan and everything is fine except for the remote will only turn the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed my fan and everything is fine except for the remote will only turn the light on and off no dim, cannot turn the fan speed up or down any thoughts????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a great price! Very modern. The remote is handy can can be wall mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take too long to install. Maybe an hour and a half. Readily quiet fan. Nice bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Budde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cathedral ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We have a cathedral ceiling in our bedroom. The remote is great
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Esch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect, from delivery to the actual fan. Looks and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. It is quiet and the remote has different settings which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: For $20 more buy a new one.  It's a pain to replace parts once it's mounted.
customer_reviews.text: Bad belt on this fan as well as a bad remote receiver. They replaced the remote receiver politely...but once it was installed and working, the belt within the motor squeaks with every rotation. I will never buy a refurbished item again. For $20 more ... A new fan would be well worth it. I have headaches from the constant squeaking. I smoke and need it to run constantly. But the installation cost me a fortune due to the reordering of parts. Can't afford to uninstall and replace it. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bought this fan and it makes the most horrible noise and blades won’t turn
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan and it makes the most horrible noise and blades won’t turn. Spent all day trying to find out and fix the problem, apparently it’s in the motor because EVERYTHING is connected right. I️ would buy this fan again but not a “ certified factory refurbished” one. I’ve always tried to stay away from refurbished items, now I see why I do!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful fans!!! Shipping fast, and good source to buy from at a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Sandwick

customer_reviews.title: The fan itself is a very nice fan, given the price as well
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself is a very nice fan, given the price as well. I honestly wouldve spent a little bit more money and got better air circulation. Also, fixing this is annoying as &#$* if youre doing it alone. Putting on the fan blades was one of the most annoying things ive ever done in my entire life. Good fan though.
customer_reviews.author: nJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan!!
customer_reviews.text: No wobbling, only a very slight squeak on high which I am hoping we can fix with some adjustments. Only thing I cant seem to get to work is the light dimming feature on the remote. Oh well, for the price I am very pleased and I doubt we will turn the light on much anyway. Love the high end silver and black look. So pretty! We did not have any issues with installation but then my husband has done this many times and knows a lot about electrical stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I should've known better than to buy a used fan, but read the reviews and thought it would be ok. IT WASN'T. Barely four months in and it won't work anymore. With the cost to install, I'm just kicking myself. Save you money and buy something that'll work for years. This is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Koelsch

customer_reviews.title: Cracked glass
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks terrific and I'm happy with it but i have to mention that the light is not dimmable could be a problem with the remote i dont know but i bough two of them and none are dimmable. Also one of them came with cracked glass cover. I will not return it just because I don't want to bringing down again since that is the last part to install in the installation process and I did not check it before start the installation. My advice!!! Check for all the parts before start
customer_reviews.author: juan carlos blanco

customer_reviews.title: Love the fan but not the light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, quiet and looks nice but the light that it puts out is terrible. Looks like a warehouse light with the led not sure if it’s the bulbs or the fixture or the light cover but I hate it. Anyone have this issue? Anyone able to recommend better bulbs?
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Gesoff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fans
customer_reviews.text: These fans are great. Easy to install. Instructions are easy to follow. Super quiet and moves the air. The remote functions are great to dim the light and adjust the speed.
customer_reviews.author: ABHanks

customer_reviews.title: Another great hunter fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, came as described. Not too difficult for my husband to install. Cools are large master bedroom. Whisper quiet. We love this model from hunter.
customer_reviews.author: mjm0216

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this fan from FrugalFairDeals refurbished and had a problem. These guys made it right and fast! Have made other orders too. If you like a good product at a great price, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: buzz

customer_reviews.title: Hunt is over.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I purchased this item. Hunter is a well known name for fans and getting it at the price that I did is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished but they look brand new. Love the style and they are very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JHT

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Remote Control!
customer_reviews.text: Came with third party remote, that lacks functionality. Yes, it's a refurbished fan and cheaper... but you lose out on functionality if it doesn't come with the original Hunter remote. I'd rather buy new and get a full *working fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sabastian J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this fan! Perfect for our bedroom. Install was easy for us. No issues. My only dislike is, the light is not as bright as I like to have. Overall look is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fatica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & great service
customer_reviews.text: Finally called an electrician, but working beautifully now. Fast replacement of broken globe.
customer_reviews.author: Granthelper

customer_reviews.title: nice fan, love the remote
customer_reviews.text: nice fan, love the remote, did not come with longer pole for pitched roof? you would have to order it??? lucy me i had one
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price - and with the professional installation (also thru Amazon), it is a thing of beauty. A lot bigger than my old one, and circulates way more air. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great beatiful fan!
customer_reviews.text: Beatiful fan changed the way our living room looked, remote went bad quickly for some reason customer care took care of us and express mailed one rekote and sensor
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change about this fan is the lightbulbs. They arent bright enough but I can switch those out. Otherwise, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would mention that the led is actually a LED bulb and not a built in LED
customer_reviews.author: liranyafa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Electrician could not get to work. Buyer beware on these refurbs!
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and quietly. I especially like the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Riddick Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this new fan. It was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Anthony Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Looked Brand New.  Was Easy to Install.
customer_reviews.text: Looked Brand New. Was Easy to Install. Very Quite and sufficient for a 400sqft room.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Barve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, runs smooth. Everything was perfect out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: the fan its self is fine and works very well
customer_reviews.text: the fan its self is fine and works very well. The problem I had was in the installation and set up of the remote function. I received good service from the factory customer service department, who replaced the remote control and receiver, but the function still did not work, I contacted a retailer, FanDiego who gave me the phone number of a fan guru who they thought could resolve the problem. He still could not get the remote to sync with the receiver but happened to have a remote from a Casablanca fan which did work.
customer_reviews.author: michael cardinale

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Great Customer Serivice
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a chance to get the fans, I bought two, installed during the 90 day warranty period. When I did finally get someone qualified to install the fans, one worked great the other fan did not work good. It keep shutting down after 30 to 60 minuet's. I wrote to FrugalFairDeals and they shipped me another fan the same week and did not have to send the bad fan back to them. The replacement fan worked great and I now have two wonderful Hunter Fans with all the things that I wanted. Good buy, great customer service. I would highly recommend this fan from FrugalFairDeals.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan 54in Contemporary Ceiling Fan in Brushed Nickel with Cased White LED Light Kit and Remote (Renewed)
product_meta.description: This fan is a contemporary fan with a soft-modern style. The integrated light fixture is the centerpiece of this design, while the smooth rounded edges make for a unified appearance throughout the whole product. The beautiful Brushed Nickel finish works well with a wide range of décor. This fan is ready to make an impression on your home.
feature_bullets: 5 Burnt Walnut / Autumn Walnut Reversible Composite Blades included
Includes integrated light kit with Cased White glass with two 9W dimmable LED bulbs included
Installer's Choice three-position mounting system allows for standard, angled or low ceiling mounting
Includes Fan/Light Universal Handheld Remote Control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
